name: Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force Expansion Pack
name_original: Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force Expansion Pack
description:
Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force Expansion Pack is an action-shooter game developed by Raven Software. It came out on 01-01-2001. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Star Trek: Voyager - Elite Force Expansion Pack is available on PC.
Nick Falzon and Sam Nouriani produced the game. Brian Raffel, Kevin Schilder, Laird M. Malamed and Mark Nelson directed the game. Kevin Schilder and Zachary Quarles scored the game.
